availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Orlando V. Talbott (Bourbon County Horse Stable)

body.p: Bourbon County, Kentucky, stable keeper. Kentucky native. Married to Margaret A. Talbott in Bourbon County, on June 7, 1853. Stable keeper in Bourbon County in 1860. Owned three enslaved persons in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865 (Civil War Union Draft Records), Taylor County, KY, May 1865, p. 13, (Accessed via ancestry.com).
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Bourbon County Marriages, Film #000183145, p. 13-14.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Bourbon, Paris, p. 25.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedule, Kentucky, Bourbon County, Paris, p. 4.
